messages.title: 3 POSITIVE REASONS TO VOTE FOR SHEENA NORQUAY
messages.content: Sheena brings real life experience to politics. Sheena believes politics is all about people. Only the Conservatives can remove Labour from power at Westminster.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Remove Labour from power at Westminster
keyPolicies.policyDescription: A vote for Sheena would bring about change locally and at Westminster, giving Na h-Eileanan an Iar a strong voice in the next Government.

leaflet.personalStatement: Sheena brings real life experience to politics. As someone who has worked in the banking sector, Sheena has seen the problems first hand, as well as being a carer for Barnardo's. Sheena has real life experience outside of politics. After the expenses scandal at Westminster she is determined to restore public trust in politicians.

endorsements.endorsement: We urgently need to make these changes so that Britain and Scotland can move forward. We cannot afford to wait any longer.

quotes.text: We urgently need to make these changes so that Britain and Scotland can move forward. We cannot afford to wait any longer.
This is a crucial time in the history of our country and the choice at this election is clear: five more years of Labour or change with the Conservatives.

images.caption: Sheena Norquay's photo with a brief biography
David Cameron's endorsement for Conservative Party

leaflet.additionalNotes: Printed on environmentally friendly paper from sustainable forests.
